author: mkwan
msg: Temporarily add the testcase numbering79.xsl to the smoketest exclude list.
This testcase does not have any problem. Smoketest choked on the GUMP machine
at this testcase because of an obscure bug in Sun's JDK 1.4.1_01-b01 for Linux(?).
Sun's JDK for Windows and IBM JDK 1.4 for Linux are OK. We will request a
JDK upgrade on the GUMP machine in the meantime.
